overview: Five beautiful girls like shopping, eating, and gossiping! Sounds familiar? But our five ladies share one other thing in common - they are all nymphomaniacs with an insatiable desire for SEX!! Shot on location in Budapest this Daring Feature Production has no less than fifteen of the hottest Hungarian porn stars doing what they do best! It's non-stop sex action with never less than 3 girls on 1 guy in every scene. Directed by legendary Frank Thring the action includes anals, ass-to-mouth and facials galore as our beauties shop and fuck until the drop!
title: Dirty Sex in the City
